pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Change Point Detection for Multivariate Time Series // Implements the nonparametric moving sum procedure for detecting changes in the joint characteristic function (NP- MOJO) for multiple change point detection in multivariate time series. See McGonigle, E. T., Cho, H. (2023) arXiv:2305.07581 for description of the NP-MOJO methodology.
